document_data.name: House Mallyth
document_data.mainbody: '''House Mallyth''' was a former noble house of [[Tethyr]] that rose to prominence several centuries before [[1479 DR]].{{Cite dragon/421/Abyssal Trade Goods: Not a Bad Thing|34}}
document_data.Activities: Due to their questionable activities, which included blackmail and influence peddling, they were soon stripped of their noble status. After losing their nobility, they left Tethyr for [[Scornubel]], [[Sembia]], [[Westgate]] and other cities. The family continued to engage in disreputable activities and reportedly traded [[demon|demonic]] goods from the [[Abyss]].
